participant_1.background:
I believe that a progressive tax system is the most equitable way to distribute wealth in a society, and that the rich should be taxed at a higher rate than the poor.
i eat breakfast then go right back to bed.
I watch funny movies to cheer myself up.
i listen to classical music.
i work at home on my computer.

My favorite vacation was when my wife and I went to the Galapagos Islands.
My family is an important part of my life
i tend to argue with myself more than i argue with myself.
i collect vintage cars.
i am a scientist.

content.text: Hello, how is your day going?
Good, just getting home from work. How is yours?
It is good. I am about to start working on a new project.
I am working on a website for a friend who is a scientist.
That sounds cool. What kind of science does he do?
He is a marine biologist. He studies the behavior of marine animals.
That is interesting. I have always been fascinated by the sea.
Me too. I love learning about all the different types of marine life.
What is your favorite marine animal?
I think my favorite marine animal is the octopus. They are so intelligent and fascinating.
Octopuses are really cool. I have always been curious about how they can change colors.
Me too. They have amazing camouflage abilities.
I have heard that they can even change their shape.
Yes, they can. They can squeeze their bodies into really small spaces.
